tool_description: Manages proxy rotation and configuration for web scraping requests to avoid rate limiting and blocking.

proxy_list.description: List of proxy servers to rotate through

rotation_strategy.description: How to rotate proxies (random, sequential, health_based)

health_check.description: Whether to perform proxy health checks

error_messages: Invalid proxy format: Proxy URLs must be in format protocol://host:port or host:port.
Invalid rotation strategy: Use one of [random, sequential, health_based].
Proxy connection failed: Unable to connect through any of the provided proxies.
Health check failed: All proxies failed health verification.
Empty proxy list: At least one proxy must be provided when not using auto mode.
usage: Configure proxy rotation by providing proxy_list and rotation_strategy. Enable health_check to verify proxy availability. Returns proxy configuration for scraping requests.

healthy_proxies.description: Number of proxies passing health checks
